channel.title: Help a levels!
channel.description:
Welcome! Can you please help me! Do you know the strip as the portal, where you can develop themselves. I'd also make it your own server, where klick in the portal should be level. I would like 6 different portalit to develop a variety of things: 1) Attack 2) Strength 3) Defence 4) Range 5) Magic 6) Pray Please help if you know how to put it to the server, or where it can donload, you will definitely help me!
That http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/7237/godwars.png or that http://runescape-quest.info/wp-content/uploads/runescape.salmoneus.net/quests/DesertTreasure/altar.jpg

item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Go to client.java and search for

case 132

Add this code between other codes

if (objectID == 13628){ addSkillXP(1000000, 2); sM("You gain some Xp in Defence!"); //sendMessage }

Use this , and apply it for your other skills.

if (ObjectID == ####) 
{
  addSkillXP(#,#);
  sM("You gain some Xp in ####!"); //sendMessage
}

Or do you want it with timers etc? I’m not fully getting you. Do you mean you want an interference with the 6 skills there and you can select which one you want to level up in?[/quote]

I like this guy , can’t understand what he is saying , but i laugh like hell
